testcase.classname: User should be able to select different Categories
testcase.name: Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.system-out: Given User open the Website homepage........................................passed And logs into the website...................................................passed When hover over a category..................................................passed And select a sub-category...................................................passed Then The sub-category page should be displayed..............................passed

testcase.name: Create successful Order
testcase.system-out: Given User open the Website homepage........................................passed And logs into the website...................................................passed And adds products to the shopping cart......................................passed When hits checkout and completes the required data..........................passed Then a confirmation message should be displayed.............................passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to add products to Compare list
testcase.name: Logged user could add different products to Compare list
testcase.system-out: Given User open the Website homepage........................................passed And logs into the website...................................................passed When User navigates to any product..........................................passed And clicks on the Add to "Compare list" button..............................passed Then a confirmation message should be displayed and the item added to the "product comparison".passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to change currency
testcase.name: Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: Given User open the Website homepage........................................passed And logs into the website...................................................passed When User clicks on the currencies dropbox and chooses Euro.................passed Then The product prices should be in Euro...................................passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to filter the results
testcase.name: Logged user could filter with color
testcase.system-out: Given User open the Website homepage........................................passed And logs into the website...................................................passed When User opens "Apparel" > "Shoes" category................................passed And Selects "Red" Colour....................................................passed Then the items displayed should be in the chosen colour.....................passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to login
testcase.name: User could log in with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given User open the Website homepage........................................passed And clicks on the login Link................................................passed When User enters valid email and password...................................passed And clicks login button.....................................................passed Then User should login successfully.........................................passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to login
testcase.name: User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.system-out: Given User open the Website homepage........................................passed And clicks on the login Link................................................passed And User clicks on forgotPassword link......................................passed When User enters his-her email..............................................passed And clicks recover button...................................................passed Then A recovery confirmation message should be displayed....................passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to register
testcase.name: User could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given User open the Website homepage........................................passed And clicks on the register Link.............................................passed When User enters valid data.................................................passed And clicks on the register button...........................................passed Then A registration confirmation message should be displayed................passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to search
testcase.name: Logged User could search for any product
testcase.system-out: Given User open the Website homepage........................................passed And logs into the website...................................................passed When user enters the search word............................................passed And clicks on the search button.............................................passed Then The search results appears.............................................passed And They should be related to the search word...............................passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to add products to Shopping cart
testcase.name: Logged user could add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.system-out: Given User open the Website homepage........................................passed And logs into the website...................................................passed When User navigates to any product..........................................passed And clicks on the Add to "shopping cart" button.............................passed Then a confirmation message should be displayed and the item added to the "shopping cart".passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to select tags
testcase.name: Logged user could select different tags
testcase.system-out: Given User open the Website homepage........................................passed And logs into the website...................................................passed When User navigates to any category.........................................passed And clicks on any tag.......................................................passed Then The Tag related Items should appear....................................passed

testcase.classname: User should be able to add products to Wishlist
testcase.name: Logged user could add different products to Wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given User open the Website homepage........................................passed And logs into the website...................................................passed When User navigates to any product..........................................passed And clicks on the Add to "wishlist" button..................................passed Then a confirmation message should be displayed and the item added to the "wishlist".passed
